hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: Creating amazing web experiences with modern technologies

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm a passionate developer focused on creating innovative web solutions. I specialize in modern technologies and I'm always looking for new challenges.
about.extendedDescription1: With over 3 years of experience in web development, I specialize in creating modern and scalable applications using the latest technologies.
about.extendedDescription2: My focus is on writing clean, maintainable code and following development best practices to deliver high-quality products.

experiencie3.title: Web Developer
experiencie3.description: Development of complete web applications using modern technologies, DevOps implementation and development best practices.

experiencia2.title: Frontend Developer
experiencia2.description: Creation of modern and responsive user interfaces for both web and mobile applications, web service API implementation.

experiencia1.title: Mobile Application Developer
experiencia1.description: Temporary position at Quasar Solutions LLC, where I had the opportunity to develop a mobile application for Banco de Guatemala, project built with Flutter for iOS and Android.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Complete e-commerce platform with shopping cart, integrated payments and admin panel.

taskManager.title: Task Management App
taskManager.description: Task management application with real-time collaboration and notifications.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: Personal website built with Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS with dark mode support.

socialApp.title: Social Network
socialApp.description: Social media application with real-time chat, posts and friend system.

university.degree: INGENIERÍA EN CIENCIA DE LA COMPUTACIÓN Y TECNOLOGÍAS DE LA INFORMACIÓN
university.description: Formación enfocada en el desarrollo de software, análisis de datos y diseño de soluciones tecnológicas mediante la aplicación de ciencia, ingeniería y matemáticas. Con énfasis en la innovación, la inclusión y la especialización en áreas como desarrollo de videojuegos, seguridad informática e inteligencia artificial.

highschool.description: Formación enfocada en el desarrollo de habilidades técnicas y blandas, con énfasis en la programación y el trabajo en equipo.

microservices.title: Building Scalable Microservices with Spring Boot
microservices.excerpt: Learn best practices for building robust and scalable microservices architectures.

mobile.title: Cross-platform Mobile Development
mobile.excerpt: Comparison between Flutter and React Native for mobile app development.

devops.title: DevOps: From Theory to Practice
devops.excerpt: Implement effective CI/CD and automate your deployments with modern tools.
